name: memos
description: Memos is a lightweight self-hosted note-taking and knowledge sharing platform. It enables users to write, save, and search memos with privacy in mind, and features support for markdown and embeds.
features: Quick capture: Write and save memos instantly with a streamlined input interface.
Markdown support: Format memos with Markdown syntax for rich text and code blocks.
Tag system: Organize memos with hashtags for easy categorization and filtering.
Full-text search: Find any memo quickly by searching through content and tags.
Timeline view: Browse memos chronologically with infinite scrolling and date navigation.
Resource embedding: Attach images, files, and links directly within memos.
Sharing: Generate public links to share specific memos with others.
API access: Integrate with other tools or build custom clients using the REST API.
Multi-user support: Create accounts for multiple users with separate memo collections.
Export functionality: Download memos in Markdown or JSON format for backup or migration.
Mobile responsive: Access and create memos from any device with responsive design.
Privacy focused: Self-hosted solution keeps all your notes under your control.
